channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Kamala Harris’ presidential prospects lift consumer sentiment
item.description: Americans' spirits are an important gauge for whether they're in the mood to shop; spending accounts for about 70% of U.S. economic activity.

item.title: Cadillac reveals new 'Opulent Velocity' performance EV concept
item.description: GM's new all-electric Cadillac concept car is designed to preview how the automaker plans to keep its high-performance V-Series vehicles relevant for EVs.

item.title: B. Riley shares jump 26% on founder’s bid to take over troubled bank
The rich can’t sell their art, so they’re using it as collateral for cash loans
item.description: “There are margin calls, death, divorce and bankruptcy, so we have endless interest for lending,” says one advisor.

item.title: Walmart, Starbucks among the most overbought stocks due for a pullback
item.description: This week's recovery rally following last week's sell-off has led investors to buy key retail names and others.

item.title: The decline of the VIX — the Wall Street ‘fear index’ — may have been too swift
Meta pulled its disinformation tracker from Facebook months before America heads to the polls, and the EU isn’t happy
item.description: CrowdTangle was used by researchers to identify and track viral falsehoods, but it was closed without a replacement in place on Wednesday.

item.title: Gaza ceasefire talks paused with resumption planned next week
item.description: Gaza ceasefire talks in Doha were paused on Friday with negotiators set to meet again next week, mediators said.

item.title: U.S. stocks are on track for their best week since November — despite Friday dip
‘Black Swan’ hedge funder warns a recession is coming this year—and the biggest market bubble in history will soon pop
item.description: “It’s not different this time,” Mark Spitznagel, cofounder and CIO of the private hedge fund Universa Investments, told Fortune.

item.title: The long-term winners as AI boosts U.S. power needs, according to Mizuho
item.description: Data center power demand will triple to 9% of total U.S. electricity consumption by the end of the decade, according to Mizuho.

item.title: S&P 500 risks snapping six-session winning streak — live coverage
Google’s ex-CEO isn’t licensed to give financial advice, but he thinks you should buy Nvidia
item.description: With tech firms investing "mind-boggling" amounts of money to win the AI race, their chip supplier of choice is the best positioned to win from the gold rush.

item.title: Yes, AI burnout is already happening at work
item.description: Companies are talking up a storm about artificial intelligence and generative AI, but there might be a danger of employee burnout from moving too fast.

item.title: U.S. consumer sentiment on the rise for the first time in five months
